title: Platinum to Diamond

embed.description: LoL Stats! Check your Summoner, MMR, Live Spectate and using powerful global League of Legends Statistics!

body:
Hello all,nice to meet you.This is my first time posting somthing semi seriours. 
I'm currently a Platinum player sitting at the lowest Rank Plat five, after pushing four hard days from Gold five I finally got what I was aiming for.

I'm not looking to stay in Plat and I would love a duo ( or more ) partner to grind out the ranks!!

----- I'm looking for somone with-----
- Skype / Curse / TeamSpeak ( I'm
Not worried what one but communication helps a lot)
- Somone that's a confident player.
- knows all lanes ( I believe I can play all lanes at a high gold level but a low Plat)
- good to talk to.
- Confident that you can lane against anything
- Can handle a emotion tilt when the game get's rough.
- Plays League on the regular (free on weekends)
- has a good sense of
Team work
I'm really not fussed what platinum you are as long as you have a good win rate in ranked! Even if your already diamond and willing to coach me along that's would be appreciated a lot.
My current played champions
-Blitzcrank (so if your an ADC your in for a surprised) 
-Swain ( I play him a lot on my gold accounts )
-Cassiopia (I played nearly 200 games with this champion last season) 
- overall I can play anyone, I understand the game I'm just looking for a partner to go a long the platinum road with!!


Thanks for reading this long and boring 
post =D

replies.body: Hi i am silver, but i easily deserve challenger, i am best player, i can play all roles at challenger level confidently. I am the master of wave manipulation, i can manipulate waves as soon as they leave the nexus. i am the masterrrr.
This guy is a living god
Yeah i should duo with him aye =P {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Do you want to play with me sometime :^)
I will let you feel the power or 2300 MMR :^)
Yeah chuck me an add I'll be home soon if your down
